title: Facebook Cut Ad Rates as Pandemic Sank Demand
text: Prices to advertise on the giant social media platform fell by as much as 20% from February to March as many businesses reduced or halted their ad spending.

title: Facebook Option Traders Make $1M Bets On Multi-Year Rally
text: Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) shares traded lower by 2% on Monday and are now down 16.4% year-to-date.

title: Google And Facebook Stock: Is Weak Ad Demand Priced In?
